column2: Test editing and saving profile information.
Test adding a new address.
Verify user can log out successfully.
Test login with registered account.
Product Search & Filtering (registered user)
Verify search results for valid keywords.
Check validation for empty search queries.
Test filtering options (price range, categories, etc.).
Verify sorting functionality (e.g., price low to high).
Verify autocomplete suggestions in the search bar.
Product Detail Page
Verify product details display correctly (title, price, description).
Test adding a product to the cart.
Verify that related products/recommendations are displayed.
Shopping Cart
Verify items added to the cart appear correctly.
Check the maximum number of items that can be added.
Checkout Process
Verify user can proceed to checkout (excluding payment integration).
Usability and Accessibility
Check intuitiveness of navigating between pages.
Test the visibility of critical CTAs (e.g., "Add to Cart," "Proceed to Checkout").
Verify compliance with WCAG guidelines (screen reader, keyboard nav).
Responsiveness testing.
Performance and Scalability
Verify homepage loads within 2 seconds under normal load.
Verify search results page loads within 3 seconds for up to 50 items
